member.name: LSA_FOREST_TRUST_INFORMATION
member.summary: The LSA_FOREST_TRUST_INFORMATION structure contains Local Security Authority forest trust information.

member.name: LSA_FOREST_TRUST_INFORMATION.RecordCount
member.summary: Number of structures in the array pointed to by the Entries member.

member.name: LSA_FOREST_TRUST_INFORMATION.Entries
member.summary: Pointer to a pointer to an array of structures, each of which contains one piece of forest trust information.
